TopicTitle: Game Crashing during Loading screen at “pumping sim once”

Articles.Content:
I’ve had game crashes and even a few blue screens of death during loading quicksaves and reverts when the loading screen gets to “pumping sim once”. (Blue screens gave no error code).

Granted I am below the minimum specs without a dedicated gpu (11th gen Intel i7), but this is the only time the game has crashed on me, and it has always been at that point.

I’ve seen a few other people experience similar problems (crashes and game freezes) on discord, and they also seem to be at that same point of “pumping sim once”.

 

Other than that and the low fps, I’ve really enjoyed my first play through of the game and I look forward to seeing it evolve over the coming months and years. (Also give the sound design team a raise and a fat bonus)
